drinks.drink_desc: Espresso shots are topped with hot water to produce a light layer of crema.
Our dark, rich espresso balanced with steamed milk and a light layer of foam.
We combine our rich, full-bodied espresso with bittersweet mocha sauce and steamed milk, then top it off with sweetened whipped cream.
Dark, rich espresso lies in wait under a smoothed and stretched layer of thick foam.
Our Cloud Macchiato is light and airy with layers of fluffy foam, cascading espresso, vanilla-flavored syrup and a drizzle of caramel.
Freshly steamed milk with vanilla-flavored syrup is marked with espresso and topped with caramel drizzle for an oh-so-sweet finish.
Our Cloud Macchiato is light and airy with layers of fluffy foam, cascading espresso, cinnamon flavored syrup, a caramel drizzle and a dusting of cinnamon.
